name: Version Control
description:
Welcome to Version Control!

Simulate the experience of debugging your Game Jam Game using the arrow keys and Ctrl + C, X, V, and Z to copy, paste, cut, and undo (refresh last ability) respectively in a match-3 style puzzle game. But be careful-- you only get so many of each, and you have to make matches to get more Ctrl!

Will you go out of Ctrl?
